txt.en: Use the Call Radhril skill and talk to Radhril

'I see, the spiders have certainly infested these tunnels in the deepest sections of the old mines. Let us continue and be on the look-out for any spider nests. We should be able to cull their numbers by destroying the nests. We should also search for any of the brood-mothers lurking about. The webs are thick. Watch your step!'
Use the summoning horn at the beginning of the tunnel to summon Radhril to your side.
You should talk to Radhril.\n\n<rgb=#FF0000>If Radhril is missing, and the Call Radhril skill is not available, try using the /pet release command.</rgb>
You should defeat Writhenset brood-mothers and destroy spider nests.\n\n<rgb=#FF0000>If Radhril is missing, and the Call Radhril skill is not available, try using the /pet release command.</rgb>
You have been tasked with defeating the spider menace within the mines of Writhenset.
'I commend your efforts, [placeholder]! Come, let us return and report our success to the Free Peoples.'
You should return to the entrance of the spider tunnels.\n\n<rgb=#FF0000>If Radhril is missing, and the Call Radhril skill is not available, try using the /pet release command.</rgb>
Return to the spider tunnel entrance
